description.value:
Trigger A creature moves into the ink-fouled water

Effect The creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:37] save to avoid becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 24 hours (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 24 hours on a critical failure). The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: The murky waters that fill the chamber grant false visions of the past.
details.disable: @Check[crafting|dc:45] (master) to release alchemical reagents to neutralize the ink in the water, @Check[nature|dc:42] (legendary) to manipulate the primal magic in the region and negate the ink's effects, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (8th rank; counteract DC 34) to counteract the magical ink in the water; four success are required to disable it (spells that purify or manipulate water, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Cuisine] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Control Water], can affect this hazard as if the caster were using an equal rank dispel magic)
details.reset: The hazard remains disabled until Baolen refills the area with ink (typically once every 4 hours).
details.routine:
(2 actions) On the trap's first action, it attempts a water jet ranged Strike on all creatures outside of the water in this room or on the stairs leading up to area A5. On its second action, the primal magic infusing the waters attempts to seep into the minds of those within it, forcing each creature in the water to attempt a @Check[will|dc:39] save against the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected

Success The creature takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 24 hours. While the creature is stupefied, it takes an additional â€“2 status penalty to checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge].

Critical Failure As failure, but @Damage[16d6[mental]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3}, and the stupefied condition has an unlimited duration.
